channel.title: My first server :O
channel.description:
[b][size=17pt]THIS IS IN DEVELOPMENT so don't be liek "AMG WRAONG SECTIN N00B!"[/size][/b] hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii this is my first server thingy i actually edited probably gonna put on downloads sometime cuz its like really old to me now based off hiyascape v1 made new home and added trees :) My actual name is graham and the first server i ever ran i couldn't think of name so just named it "Graham's Server" and if i were ever to change it ppl wouldn't know it was me :O some1 took my name on mopar smf :( well this is just a look at it :D [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/bigsmilewhite.jpg[/img]
[b]Oh and forgot to add i put in some commands that are like god but they do different emotes[/b] ::ghost ::glide ::god ::ghost ::flyingcarpet ::swim ::mad ::baby ::head ::airwalk ::moonwalk in the first couple i'm doing ::ghost :D
[b]i still need a few things done like putting another mini of some sort in cave entrance/ adding a few more items, fixing some stuff[/b]
nyway pics [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/bigsmilewhite.jpg[/img]
[b]entrance[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamserverwhereustartout.jpg[/img]
[b]starting look[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamserverstartingoutfit.jpg[/img]
[b][size=14pt]lots of added items and specs[/size][/b] [b] all items in shops r sellable there's a gs-making store[/b] [b]lotsa random stuff like egg-beaters undead chickens weps[/b]
[b]shops[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamservershops.jpg[/img]
[b]zekes shop[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamservershop1.jpg[/img]
[b]elegant store[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/elegantstore-1.jpg[/img]
[b]zammy spec (took snapshop at like beginning of it :P)[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamserverspecs.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Two other minigames[/b][/size] [b]3rdage mini - go to there, buy ticket, use on glider, go to 3rdage arena where npc att's u :O[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamserver3rdagemini.jpg[/img]
[b]Original Gsmini from hiyascape v1 only npcs r aggressive (they have jad gfx)[/b] :) [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamserveraggressivenpcs.jpg[/img]
[b]some portals[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamserverportals.jpg[/img]
[b]badly done cw[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/badlydonecw-1.jpg[/img]
[b]and that 1 cave entrance[/b] [img]http://i271.photobucket.com/albums/jj146/grahaam/grahamservernewmini.jpg[/img]

item.title: My first server :O
item.dc:creator: @This_is_not_an_Alt_P This is not an Alt :P
item.description:
@This_is_not_an_Alt_P wrote:

[size=17pt]THIS IS IN DEVELOPMENT so don’t be liek “AMG WRAONG SECTIN N00B!”[/size]
hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii this is my first server thingy i actually edited
probably gonna put on downloads sometime cuz its like really old to me now
based off hiyascape v1
made new home and added trees
My actual name is graham and the first server i ever ran i couldn’t think of name so just named it “Graham’s Server” and if i were ever to change it ppl wouldn’t know it was me
some1 took my name on mopar smf
well this is just a look at it

Oh and forgot to add i put in some commands that are like god but they do different emotes
::ghost
::glide
::god
::ghost
::flyingcarpet
::swim
::mad
::baby
::head
::airwalk
::moonwalk
in the first couple i’m doing ::ghost

i still need a few things done like putting another mini of some sort in cave entrance/ adding a few more items, fixing some stuff

there’s a gs-making store
lotsa random stuff like egg-beaters undead chickens weps
